welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Halver, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in our culture and traditions. We hope you have a memorable stay here!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Dortmund Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Cologne/bonn Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal for long-haul flights and premium airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
